name: BSlider
tagline: A simple way to create a slider for Backbone views.
body: ### BSlider A backbone based slider for backbone views. _Note: This is a very crude version. Since the intent was to release early, a snapshot version has been released_ #Getting Started Backbone.Slider (BSlider) is built on top of [Backbone.js](http://backbonejs.org). Make sure Backbone is setup in your application, and you have the CSS files for Backbone.Slider. Backbone.Slider uses [Font Awesome](http://fortawesome.github.io/Font-Awesome/). Please be sure to include that. ####Backbone.Slider ``` var MySlider = Backbone.Slider.extend({ views: [myBackboneViewOne, myBackboneViewTwo] }); //The Views should be rendered var instance = new MySlider().render(); ``` ####addView instance.addView Add one more view, or an array of views to an instance of the slider. ###More features coming soon. Stay tuned! ### Author @karun012 ### Support Contact me at karun012@gmail.com if you have any questions/comments/suggestions.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
